column4: Hi, I have a question... why is my brand new ubuntu 9.04 install getting stuff from ftp.debian.org and converting it?
it is also doing this _very_, very slowly, and if it'll be doing that for all 20k packages... that will take ages.
I did not install debian... installed ubuntu. here is the file: http://pastebin.com/m7b551e57
can you also check what's in /etc/apt/sources.list.d ?
then you're the (un)happy witness of extraterrestrial intervention :)
could you add Debug::pkgInitConfig "true"; to /etc/apt/apt.conf and relaunch apt-get update ? It should display the configuration of APT
here is what it said: http://paste.pocoo.org/show/114412/
then I'm afraid I really don't know :)
heh, alright, thanks for your help
